items.title: Unmatched Efficiency
items.description: 140x lower storage cost compared to Elasticsearch.

items.title: High Performance
items.description: The Rust-native platform has clocked ingest speeds of 2,030 MB/second per CPU core.

items.title: Enterprise Scale
items.description: The stateless node architecture scales to handle petabytes of data without sacrificing performance.

items.title: Flexible Deployment
items.description: Deploy in the cloud, on-premises, or in a hybrid environment to meet your needs.

seo.title: See OpenObserve in Action | Contact Sales
seo.description: Explore OpenObserve's cutting-edge observability features with a customized demo. Enjoy real-time interaction, expert insights, and tailored solutions for your unique needs.
